medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over black chalk
title: Christ Resurrecting a Paralytic
marks:
Inscription

on back, in black ink: [Andrea Sach
description: sketch of figures standing clustered around a column, including figure in URQ who has climbed up on column base to look down; bare-chested reclining figure in front of column with PL hand on chest and PR hand outstretched; verso:  Italian text in brown ink
